publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-497# Tommy Sheridan: Tendering of Caledonian MacBrayne Ferry Services-That the Parliament believes that the Scottish Executive should immediately end the tendering process for Caledonian MacBrayne ferry services in light of the European Court of Justice's ruling on the Altmark Trans bus company case.
S2M-497# Tendering of Caledonian MacBrayne Ferry Services (lodged on 14 October 2003) Rosie Kane*
